thread.section_title: StorageMart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StorageMart | storage-mart.com | 2 of 211
thread.title: Robert Venci

author: Robert Venci
title: Robert Venci
text:
The Storage Mart operation in Jefferson City, MO. is being run efficiently and in a streamlined fashion. There was no problem with getting a proper sized storage area. The security makes me feel that my property is being overwatched and that I don't have to worry about loss or theft.
The manager at the facility is quite knowledgeable and what was particularly impressive is that she remembered me by name when I walked into the office/store to purchase some boxes.
